price: Sie sagten: Wir sind zu einem Volk von Übeltätern gesandt,
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ أُرۡسِلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمٖ مُّجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: qālū innā ur'sil'nā ilā qawmin muj'rimīna
